Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Del \Del\, n. [See {Deal}, n.] Share; portion; part. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: del \del\ n. (Math.) a differential operator which, operating on a function of several variables, gives the sum of the partial derivatives of the function with respect to the three orthogonal spatial coordinates; -- also called the {gradient} or {grad}. It is represented by an inverted Greek capital delta ([nabla]), and is thus because of its shape also called {nabla}, meaning harp in Hebrew. [PJC]
